attributes.action: Investigate and prosecute EVERY Politician who has broken the rules. Just like Joe-public would be prosecuted
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the recent media attention of the Politicians and their "Expenses" claims, rule-breaking and bending thereof, we the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to ensure that all Politicians and staff that have been party to the expenses rules being broken and "bent" in such a way that Politicians financially benefit themselves be fully and openly investigated and prosecuted to the full extent of the law. In the same way that per every member of the general public would be that broke the law.

rejection.details: Government cannot prosecute individuals or organisations. It is the role of the police to investigate suspected crimes, and the role of the Crown Prosecution Service to decide whether there is a case to answer, and to prosecute.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
